channel.title: How can I get permission to save my translation?
channel.description: I think I already mark it for translate,but I can not save my translation, the page tell me "You don't have permission to create new pages",so ,how can I get permission to save my translation?

item.title: How can I get permission to save my translation?
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Just added you to the “translator group”. You should now be able to save the changes you made.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
item.source: How can I get permission to save my translation?

item.title: How can I get permission to save my translation?
item.dc:creator: Aexevon
item.description:
Hi

My username for wiki is “Aexevon”, it is same as my username in forums.

Thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: How can I get permission to save my translation?

item.title: How can I get permission to save my translation?
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Like explained here, sadly at the current point in time I have to manually give you the ability to translate the wiki. For this, I’d need the name you used to register on the wiki.

Adding to that, let me just thank you for being willing to take your time to translate our documentation.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
